de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.tests.vis

Class PubVis

  • java.lang.Object
    • prefuse.Visualization
      • de.uni.leipzig.asv.zitationsgraph.tests.vis.PubVis
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.util.Observer

    public class PubVis
extends prefuse.Visualization
implements java.util.Observer
    class which specify the visual data for the graph of the GraphManagerclass It defines the node color, the labels by mouseover, the layout and the ReferenceFilter.
    Author:
    loco

      void update(java.util.Observable o, java.lang.Object message)
      override method of the observer interface the update method is responsible to stop and start the action, if the data graph will explored or cleared and accordingly the graph is explored The Visualization will also clear his visual groups, if the graph will be clear
